CustomField.description: Tracks if this NPN Account doing POS Submission (This is done until we rollout for every NPN) and their NPN_Program_Signed_Date__c >= 2019-04-15. It is used in the formula field "POS Portal Submission" to combine the existing as well as the new ones (that gets onboarded after 2019-04-15). - Not to be shown in the UI
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tracks if this NPN Account doing POS Submission (This is done until we rollout for every NPN) and their NPN_Program_Signed_Date__c >= 2019-04-15
CustomField.label: POS Portal Submission (Existing NPNs)
